resources.string:
VaultGuard Revolution is a security and privacy tool. It is not an official identity verification system and is not affiliated with any government authority.

VaultGuard Revolution is not a KYC/AML solution and must not be used as a substitute for legally required identity verification.

All security and authentication decisions remain the responsibility of the user and/or the integrating organization.

This is a draft privacy policy placeholder.

VaultGuard Revolution is designed with privacy-by-default principles. The app processes biometric-related data only for user-initiated authentication flows.

We do not sell personal data.
